sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function MovieContainer({ movieData, renderStarIcons, handleMovieClick, handleMovieReset, selectedMovie, }) { return (
{selectedMovie ? (

{selectedMovie.Title} ({selectedMovie.Year})

{selectedMovie.imdbRating} {renderStarIcons(Math.round(selectedMovie.imdbRating * 2) / 4)}

Director: {selectedMovie.Director}

Actors: {selectedMovie.Actors}

{selectedMovie.Plot}

) : (
{movieData.map((movie, index) => (
handleMovieClick(movie)} >

{movie.Title} ({movie.Year})

{movie.Runtime}
{movie.imdbRating} {renderStarIcons(Math.round(movie.imdbRating * 2) / 4)}
{movie.Type !== "movie" ? "Series, " : ""} {movie.Genre}
))}
)}
); }
